channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 1 - Ubuntu Software Installation Software Components Binary Executable (/usr/bin or /usr/lib) Libraries & Shared Objects (/usr/lib) Configuration Files (/etc or dotfiles) Documentation (/usr/share) systemd Scripts Software Installation Methods Ubuntu Software Center Synaptic Package Manager apt snap Download Packages Compile from Source Install Things!
